The recycler is able to process almost any biomaterial into compost, which is why I have been looking for a use of the correspondingly large quantities. I have noticed that decomposition of compost produces flammable, high-energy gas.
With the help of my new invention, I can make this process usable. The fermenter picks up compost and ferments it to Biogas and small amounts of Dirt.
Info: Material throughput is highest when the stack of compost is full.
